welcome_message_body: Welcome to Hagerstown, where small-town charm meets rich history and natural beauty. Enjoy exploring our quaint downtown, historic sites, and scenic parks â€“ we're delighted to have you here!

restaurants.name: Schmankerl Stube
restaurants.description: Schmankerl Stube is a german restaurant located in Hagerstown.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport houses all necessary facilities for travelers including check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The General Aviation Terminal at Wash. County Regional Airport is dedicated to private and corporate aircraft operations, providing services such as fueling, maintenance, and hangar rentals.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by connecting to the designated network.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Eastern Wv Regional Airport/Shepherd Field Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Frederick Municipal Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the terminal building.
